<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Directed Poison](/Feats.aspx?ID=3393) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 125</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_cloudkill_](/Spells.aspx?ID=42)

</column>

---

When you cast _cloudkill_, modify its duration to be sustained up to 1 minute, and modify its standard effect to include the following: The cloud doesn't move away from you each round. Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the cloud 10 feet in the direction of your choice.
name: Directed Poison
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _cloudkill_
